title: A Bug Regarding Spirit Guard Udyr
body:
On the previous Christmas morning I received a 25 dollar RP pre-paid card.
I rushed onto my computer and logged in onto League, and purchased Spirit Guard Udyr for myself.
I was stunned by the utter beauty of the skin, (sorry i'm cheesing it alot).
It took me around 5 games with the skin when I realised that all the jokes and taunts i've been using on ANY stance have been only Bear Stance emotes.
Phoenix stance would say: "Man I love honey, but bee's, EUGH."
Tiger Stance would say: "Man I love honey, but bee's, EUGH."
So would Turtle and of course, Bear stance.
So I was wondering if this was a bug, and if it was you could fix it, or if there was a problem with my league.
Nonetheless I love the skin, was just wondering if that could be fixed.

I know it's late, but Merry Christmas and a wonderful new year!
- AstroLord

replies.body: I actually like the Bear stance taunt. URFURFURUFRFURUFRUFRUF

> Joke
> 
>      "Stripes would be good camouflage... if tigers weren't bright orange!"
>      "The turtle is one part fortress, one part mobile home."
>      "Man, I love honey, but bees... ugh!"
>      "Emanating fire really cuts down on comfy nest options." 
> 
> Taunt
> 
>      "You'd make a good scratching post."
>      "My shell has this little dent in the shape of your face."
>      "You'd look better after a good mauling."
>      "All I see are soon-to-be ashes." 

I don't think there are separated taunts and jokes for each different stance to begin with, they're all mixed together it seems. At least according to [LoLwiki - Udyr - Background](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Udyr/Background). (Remember to select Spirit Guard in the Quote section)
Well I spent half an hour just trying and going through the stances to find different jokes, but they were all just the bear stance ones.
I think you need to max the skills to change the emotes, not sure though
Maxed em, Only got that ability, all the possible options, but it still doesn't work.
Better give me some of that dank kush.
